name: Juniper | JUNOS | Network | BGP | Peer State Changed (SYSLOG)
description: Jul 25 22:34:52 rpd[1260]: RPD_BGP_NEIGHBOR_STATE_CHANGED: BGP peer 10.99.2.2 (Internal AS 65000) changed state from Established to Idle (event RecvNotify)

patterns.value_re: RPD_BGP_NEIGHBOR_STATE_CHANGED: BGP peer (?P<peer>\S+) \(.+? AS (?P<as>\d+)\) changed state from (?P<from_state__enum__bgp_state>\S+) to (?P<to_state__enum__bgp_state>\S+)

name: Juniper | JUNOS | Network | BGP | Prefix Limit Exceeded (SYSLOG)
description: Jul 25 23:31:36 rpd[1260]: 10.99.2.1 (External AS 65000): Configured maximum prefix-limit threshold(1) exceeded for inet-unicast nlri: 2

patterns.value_re: rpd\[\d+\]: (?P<peer>\S+) \(\S+ AS (?P<as>\d+)\): Configured maximum prefix-limit threshold\(\d+\) exceeded
